entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
